headline: Duke Energy names Katherine Neebe as chief communications officer
summary: Duke Energy announced today it has appointed Katherine Neebe, senior vice president and chief sustainability officer, as chief communications officer (CCO), effective Feb. 24.

raw.headline: Duke Energy names Katherine Neebe as chief communications officer
raw.summary: Duke Energy announced today it has appointed Katherine Neebe, senior vice president and chief sustainability officer, as chief communications officer (CCO), effective Feb. 24.

headline: Duke Energy prepares for approaching winter storm
summary: Duke Energy is monitoring forecasts and preparing for a mixture of snow and ice, which could cause power outages in some areas.

raw.headline: Duke Energy prepares for approaching winter storm
raw.summary: Duke Energy is monitoring forecasts and preparing for a mixture of snow and ice, which could cause power outages in some areas.

headline: Duke Energy Florida Celebrates Delivering on Nearly 750-Megawatt Solar Commitment in Florida
summary: All 10 of the company's Clean Energy Connection solar energy sites are now fully operational ST. PETERSBURG, FL / ACCESS Newswire / February 18, 2025 / With all 10 of Duke Energy Florida's Clean Energy Connection solar energy sites now fully operational, ...
